description: This file sets up and exports a React context provider component (`QueryProvider`) for managing React Query's client configuration throughout a React application, specifically using the TanStack React Query library. It initializes a singleton `QueryClient` with specific default options for query caching and refetching behavior.

methods.name: getClient
methods.description: Returns a singleton instance of `QueryClient`, initializing it if it doesn't exist yet with specific default options.

methods.name: QueryProvider
methods.description: React component that provides the QueryClient context to its children, facilitating React Query's data fetching and caching capabilities.
